info.name: HMS Complete API - All Endpoints
info.description: Postman collection for testing amenity, exchange rate, folio item, housekeeping, and maintenance endpoints in the HMS Front Desk service

item.name: Amenity Management

request.description: Create a new amenity for the hotel
Get all amenities for the hotel
Get a specific amenity by ID
Update an existing amenity
Delete an amenity

item.description: All endpoints related to amenity management

item.name: Exchange Rate Management

request.description: Create a new exchange rate for the hotel
Get all exchange rates for the hotel with pagination
Get a specific exchange rate by ID
Update an existing exchange rate (all fields are optional)
Delete an exchange rate
Get all available currencies from the system

item.description: All endpoints related to exchange rate management

item.name: Folio Item Management

request.description: Add a charge item to a folio
Get all folio items for the hotel

query.description: The folio ID to get items for

request.description: Get all folio items for a specific folio
Get a specific folio item by ID
Update an existing folio item (all fields are optional)
Transfer all folio items from one folio to another
Void a folio item with a reason
Settle multiple folio items by creating payouts
Delete a folio item

item.description: All endpoints related to folio item management including charges, transfers, settlements, and voiding

item.name: Housekeeping Management

request.description: Create a new housekeeping task for a room
Start a housekeeping task and set room status to CLEANING
Complete a housekeeping task and set room status to AVAILABLE
Get all housekeeping tasks with pagination and user details
Get a specific housekeeping task by ID
Update a housekeeping task (all fields optional)
Delete a housekeeping task and set room status to AVAILABLE

item.description: All endpoints related to housekeeping task management including room status updates

item.name: Maintenance Management

request.description: Create a new maintenance request for a room or area
Create a new maintenance request for a specific area
Start maintenance work and set room status to MAINTENANCE
Complete maintenance work and set room status to AVAILABLE
Get all maintenance requests with pagination and user details
Get a specific maintenance request by ID
Update a maintenance request (all fields optional)
Delete a maintenance request

item.description: All endpoints related to maintenance request management including room and area maintenance

item.name: Room Management

request.description: Create a new room with amenities and connected rooms
Get all rooms with pagination
Get a specific room by ID with amenities and connected rooms
Get all rooms of a specific room type
Get rooms by status (AVAILABLE, OCCUPIED, CLEANING, MAINTENANCE, DIRTY)
Update an existing room (all fields optional)
Delete a room

item.description: All endpoints related to room management including amenities, connected rooms, and status updates

item.name: Reservation Management

request.description: Create a new reservation for single or multiple connected rooms
Update an existing reservation (all fields optional)
Get reservations within a date range with room availability
Check in a guest - updates reservation status and room status to OCCUPIED
Check out a guest - updates room status to DIRTY and closes folio
Create a group booking with multiple guests and rooms

item.description: All endpoints related to reservation management including check-in, check-out, and group bookings

item.name: Rate Plan Management

request.description: Create a new rate plan for the hotel
Get all rate plans with pagination
Get a specific rate plan by ID
Update an existing rate plan (all fields optional)
Delete a rate plan

item.description: All endpoints related to rate plan management

item.name: Authentication Management

request.description: Authenticate user and get access token
Create a new user account
Get a specific user by ID
Get all employees with pagination
Authenticate and authorize service requests with required permissions

item.description: All endpoints related to user authentication, authorization, and employee management

item.name: Role Management

request.description: Create a new role with assigned permissions
Get all roles for the hotel with their permissions
Get a specific role by ID with its permissions
Update an existing role (all fields optional)
Delete a role
Get all available permissions in the system

item.description: All endpoints related to role and permission management
